info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches the latest 10-Q and 10-K filings. Prioritizes HTML for both. 10-K also includes Excel fallback if HTML is unavailable. Supports alias learning and GitHub persistence.

get.description: Returns most recent 10-Q and 10-K filing links for a U.S. public company.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Public company name or ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, Amazon, Meta).

200.description: Filing links and resolved company metadata.

Matched Company Name.description: Official SEC company name matched from user input.

CIK.description: Central Index Key used to pull SEC filings.

10-Q Filing.description: Link to the HTML version of the most recent 10-Q filing.

10-K Filing.description: Link to the most recent 10-K (HTML preferred, Excel fallback if available).

404.description: No matching company or filings found.
